meta_description: At Historic Georgetown, we support the historic preservation of our community. Explore the places to visit in Georgetown by clicking here.
admission_text:
# JOIN TODAY and Help a Cause Aimed at Preserving History 

## 

[Join Today](http://web.archive.org/web/20251201060229/https://historicgeorgetown.app.neoncrm.com/forms/membership)

**North American Reciprocal Museum (NARM)  
** Any membership at the $100 level or higher gets you access to NARM. Through this special membership benefit, you will have access to over 1,000 museums throughout the United States and Canada at NO COST! Click [here to go to the NARM website](http://web.archive.org/web/20251201060229/https://narmassociation.org/) and learn more.

### What Does Membership in Historic Georgetown Mean? 

Membership in Historic Georgetown Inc. means you become a voting member of the nonprofit, much like a shareholder in a corporation. Members are entitled to vote at our annual meeting on various proposals and the election of directors.Our members are interested in preserving not only the history of the 19th century American West, but also the small-town character of Georgetown, Colorado. Although our current population is about 1,100 people, Georgetown has become a “home town” to thousands throughout the United States and the world who do not reside here. Historic Georgetown members provide an essential part of the funding and the encouragement necessary to continue our efforts to maintain and preserve our properties, mining heritage, and open lands. Membership dues provide essential revenue to help with day to day expenses as well as help fund larger projects, such as th...

### **Historic Georgetown, Inc.**

##  Home of the Hamill House Museum | Historic Georgetown, Inc. is "Building the Future by Restoring the Past"

#  Advocating Historic Preservation for Our Community

Historic Georgetown Inc. is a nonprofit 501(c)(3) community organization in Georgetown, CO that has advocated historic preservation and education for our city since 1970. We strive to foster a community in which each citizen contributes to the preservation of historic structures and areas of Georgetown. In doing so, people can immerse themselves in the rich culture and knowledge of our town’s history.

##  Who We Are

We are a nonprofit aiming to foster a community, in which each citizen contributes to the preservation of historic structures and areas of Georgetown. In doing so, people can immerse themselves in the rich culture and knowledge of our town’s history.

[ Learn More About Us ](/web/20251206100536/https://historicgeorgetown.org/about-hgi/)
